thread.section_title: LuxHair Wigs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LuxHair Wigs | www.luxhair.com
thread.title: Linda Stephens-bowers
thread.title_full: LuxHair Wigs reviewed by Linda Stephens-bowers

author: Linda Stephens-bowers
title: Linda Stephens-bowers
text: I received my wig and it was beautiful but I am 62 and the color wasn't right and I just didn't look good in the long hair so I called to return it and they gave me no hassle they helped me pick a new style and color it is supposed to come today I am excited!!! The best part about this company is that the wig that I was to return they told me to keep it as long as I donated it to a cancer center so that is what I did . I had breast cancer 5 yrs ago so I called the Schiffler Cancer Center in Wheeling West Virginia and told them my story about Sherri Shepherd's wigs and they were very excited about the donation! So thank you Sherri Shepherd u r first class keep up the good work. God bless u and ur company
